quests.desc: Your objective is to recover the vacuum from the Microsoft chest in the sauna.
commands: take TextWorld style key from table
unlock TextWorld style gateway with TextWorld style key
unlock Microsoft chest with Microsoft passkey
take TextWorld style key from table
unlock TextWorld style gateway with TextWorld style key
unlock Microsoft chest with Microsoft passkey

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A typical one.

 You see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cookery.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a study.

 You see a stand. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a stand, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a mantle. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the mantle.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a bar, cool, but is it normal? You better believe it is. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You see a basket.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The basket is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bathroom. You begin to take stock of what's here.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Welcome to the office.

 Were you looking for a desk? Because look over there, it's a desk. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the desk.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You see a chair. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]The chair appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've stumbled into an usual room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be usual. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the basement. Let's see what's in here.

 You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a sauna. The room is well lit.

 You can see a Microsoft chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The Microsoft chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a drawer. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You're now in the parlor.

 You can make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. An usual kind of place.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the mantelpiece you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You make out an armchair. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the armchair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The armchair appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
Ah, the laundromat. This is some kind of laundromat, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You see a bench. The bench is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_7]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bench.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You arrive in a shower. A typical kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. A typical one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've entered a spare room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] TextWorld style gateway leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You have stumbled into a laundry place. Not the laundry place you'd expect. No, this is a laundry place.

 You see a rack. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a rack, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_8]On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] TextWorld style gateway leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cellar. A typical kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 Oh, great. Here's a toolbox. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a shelf. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the shelf. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]The shelf appears to be empty. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a counter. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The counter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_9] On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_9]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing is empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a chamber.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a closet.

 You can see a suitcase.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out a table. [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the table. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
Ah, the washroom. This is some kind of washroom, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere.

 You see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet in the room.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_7], so there's that.[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to TextWorld! Please recover the vacuum from the Microsoft chest in the sauna.
